mapper.select: select A.iboard, A.title, A.iuser, date_format(A.regdt, '%Y-%m-%d') as regdt, A.thumbnail, B.favCnt, C.username, C.nickname from diaryDB A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT iboard, count(iboard) as favCnt FROM favDB GROUP BY iboard ) B ON A.iboard = B.iboard LEFT JOIN userDB C ON A.iuser = C.iuser WHERE C.iuser = #{iuser} ORDER BY A.iboard desc
mapper.insert: insert into diaryDB (title, content, iuser, thumbnail) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{iuser}, #{thumbnail});
mapper.select: select * from diaryDB ORDER BY iboard DESC LIMIT 1;
mapper.delete: delete from diaryDB where iboard = #{iboard} and iuser = #{iuser}
mapper.select: select A.icmt, A.comment, A.iboard, A.iuser, date_format(A.regdt, '%Y-%m-%d') as regdt, B.profileImg, B.nickname, B.introduction from cmtDB A inner join userDB B on A.iuser = B.iuser where iboard = #{iboard}
mapper.insert: insert into cmtDB (comment, iboard, iuser, thumbnail) values (#{comment}, #{iboard}, #{iuser}, #{thumbnail})
mapper.delete: delete from cmtDB where icmt = #{icmt} and iuser = #{iuser}
delete from favDB where iuser = #{iuser} and iboard = #{iboard}
